release_note: Enhanced iCloud sync to work with Mind Thread macOS desktop version Multiple versions can be kept when resolving file version conflicts Endpoints of a Connection can be dragged to change the connected node You can apply theme with colors only and added more theme colors Improved fold unfold animations You can choose font face instead of just font family Color pickers now provide theme colors to choose from Improved keyboard navigation and optimized the shortcuts for canvas zooming Fixed a bug where it is hard to show edit menu when tapping a Connection Other bug fixes and improvements
adopted iPadOS 16 desktop class app enhancements. optimized for trackpad mouse and keyboard input. bug fixes and improvements.
